name: Soul Data
description:
Titus is a demon hunter. Using special magic and abilities his job is to free Soul City from the demons who are destroying it. But where did the demons come from?

As Titus explores the city and encounters allies such as Aaron the mage and 'The Lady in White', he begins to hear of a secret force called 'Gaia', and learns to decipher a series of scrolls which hold the key to his future, and the future of his world.
